text: @NYGovCuomo How about hazard pay for essential workers? I'm a track worker for @TWULocal100 working for the @MTA who have had over 100 death from #COVID19 . If anyone deserves it we do. We received the least respect of any Frontline workers even though we get most them to work safely daily.
